variables.name: station_id
variables.description: The station identification code. Note that the first two characters denote the FIPS country code, the third character is a network code that identifies the station numbering system used, and the remaining eight characters contain the actual station ID.

variables.name: latitude
variables.description: Latitude of the station (in decimal degrees).

variables.name: longitude
variables.description: Longitude of the station (in decimal degrees).

variables.name: state
variables.description: U.S. postal code for the state (for U.S. stations only).

variables.name: gsn_flag
variables.description:
A flag that indicates whether the station is part of the GCOS
           Surface Network (GSN). The flag is assigned by cross-referencing 
           the number in the WMOID field with the official list of GSN 
           stations. There are two possible values:

           Blank = non-GSN station or WMO Station number not available
           GSN   = GSN station

variables.name: hcn_crn_flag
variables.description:
A flag that indicates whether the station is part of the U.S.
CRN FLAG  Historical Climatology Network (HCN) or U.S. Climate Refererence
          Network (CRN).  There are three possible values:

           Blank = Not a member of the U.S. Historical Climatology 
	           or U.S. Climate Reference Networks
           HCN   = U.S. Historical Climatology Network station
	   CRN   = U.S. Climate Reference Network or U.S. Regional Climate 
	           Network Station

variables.name: wmo_id
variables.description:
The World Meteorological Organization (WMO) number for the
           station.  If the station has no WMO number (or one has not yet 
	   been matched to this station), then the field is blank.

variables.name: station_id
variables.description: The station identification code. Note that the first two characters denote the FIPS country code, the third character is a network code that identifies the station numbering system used, and the remaining eight characters contain the actual station ID.
